Description

Upfall Studios is an indie game studio based in Portugal, making games the old fashioned way, a team of one person, a few ideas, and a lot of "love".

History

Early history

The core team is one person, but that does not mean he works alone all the time, partnering with others (designers, musicians, etc) to create fun and creative games with that special touch. Across all projects we worked in games for a wide range of platforms, including Windows, Mac, Linux, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo 3DS, Wii U, PS4, Xbox One, Xbox360, iOS and Android.

Projects

  • Quest of Dungeons
